Literature.Title: Panurgines, novel antimicrobial peptides from the venom of communal bee Panurgus calcaratus (Hymenoptera: Andrenidae).
Literature.Author: Cujová S, Slaninová J, Monincová L, Fucík V, Bednárová L, Stokrová J, Hovorka O, Voburka Z, Straka J, Cerovský V

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Micrococcus luteus CCM 144(MIC=4.5µM),Bacillus subtilis 168(MIC=5.8µM),Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=76.7µM),Escherichia coli B(MIC=11.3µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa(MIC=31.7µM),Candida albicans F7-39/IDE99(MIC=7.7µM)
